nodes.text: The Special Loathsome Forces was a special forces military unit that fought during the Megalomaniac Wars. Prod served in this unit as Sergeant-at-Claws.

The Special Loathsome Forces were mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
